name: More accurate camp defense
description:
This solo development project made by Ege Canıbek in Unity during 11 days (around 120 working hours) for MGDP Jam, 2022.

[CREDITS]

All icons from www.flaticon.com
My some sfx are unique, I mixed no copyright sounds and created almost all of it with audacity. Some sfx credits i have to share:
